Title: Relates to remedies for a violation of the prohibition on a landlord from refusing to rent due to a tenant's involvement in a prior dispute
Summary: Provides penalties when a landlord of a residential premises refuses to rent to a potential tenant on the basis that the potential tenant was involved in a past or pending landlord-tenant action or summary proceeding.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property law, in relation to remedies for a violation of the prohibition on a landlord from refusing to rent due to a tenant's involvement in a prior dispute
